tagline: A simple application for quering the meals for the mensa (and other facilities) at University Paderborn.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Mensa-UPB
body:
### Welcome to Mensa UPB.
Mensa UPB is a simple Android application to display the meals of the mensa at the University of Paderborn on a weekly base.

### Roadmap

Following features are planned for the future:

* Display opening time
* Display static meals (e.g. for One-Way-Snack)
* Provide better response when reloading data

### Support or Contact
If you have any problems with Mensa UPB don't hesitate to contact me or file an issue.
